entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
